import React, { useState } from 'react'; import { motion } from 'framer-motion'; import Card from '../components/Card'; import Badge from '../components/Badge'; const Courses = () => { const [activeLanguage, setActiveLanguage] = useState('tutor'); const courses = { tutor: [ { level: 'Primary School Program', title: 'Tutor-Led Language Program', description: 'Expert tutors deliver interactive French and German lessons aligned with CBC for primary schools.', duration: 'Per school term', schedule: 'Weekly sessions', image: '/Images/IMG-20250410-WA0098.jpg', features: [ 'Interactive lessons', 'Custom lesson plans', 'Songs, games, and drama', 'Cultural immersion', 'Student engagement' ], } ] }; return (
{/* Hero Section */}

Our Language Programs

Discover our comprehensive French and German language programs designed for primary schools

{/* Course Cards */}
{courses.tutor.map((course, index) => (
{course.level}

{course.title}

{course.description}

{course.duration}
{course.schedule}
    {course.features.map((feature, featureIndex) => (
  • {feature}
    • ))}
))}
{/* Testimonials */}

Student Success Stories

{[ { name: 'Sarah M.', course: 'French Program', quote: 'The French program at Pearlson transformed our students\' language skills and opened doors to new opportunities.', }, { name: 'John K.', course: 'German Program', quote: 'Excellent teaching methods and supportive environment. Our students can now confidently speak German.', }, { name: 'Mary W.', course: 'French Program', quote: "Starting from scratch, our students never thought they'd be able to hold conversations in French. Thank you, Pearlson!", }, ].map((testimonial, index) => (

{testimonial.name}

{testimonial.course}

"{testimonial.quote}"

 ))}
); }; export default Courses;
